import { Table } from "../components"; const PLAYER = { first_name: 'Jerry', last_name: 'Johnston', number: '22', positions: ['Attack', 'Middie'], career: { games_played: 31, goals: 15, goals_per_game: 0.1, assists: 6, assists_per_game: 0, points: 21, points_per_game: 0.1 }, seasons: [ { season_id: 1, name: '2020', games_played: 4, goals: 4, assists: 4, points: 8 }, { season_id: 2, name: '2021', games_played: 14, goals: 29, assists: 10, points: 39 }, { season_id: 3, name: '2022', games_played: 9, goals: 16, assists: 7, points: 23 }, ] } const Player = () => { const { career } = PLAYER; const headers = [ { label: 'Name', className: 'whitespace-nowrap', default: true }, { label: 'GP', alt: 'Games Played' }, { label: 'G' }, { label: 'A' }, { label: 'PTS' }, ]; const columns = { name: 'string', games_played: 'number', goals: 'number', assists: 'number', points: 'number', } return (
lmao
